table

Header 1 | Header 2
-------- | --------
Cell 1   | Cell 2
Cell 3   | Cell 4

table with leading pipe

|Header 1 | Header 2
|-------- | --------
|Cell 1   | Cell 2
|Cell 3   | Cell 4

multiple header rows

|Header 1 | Header 2
|Header 3 | Header 4
|-------- | --------
|Cell 1   | Cell 2
|Cell 3   | Cell 4

tbody th

|Header 1 | Header 2
|-------- | --------
|_. Cell 1   | Cell 2
|_. Cell 3   | Cell 4

scope row thead

|_. Header 1 | Header 2 | Header 3 |
|-------- | -------- | --- |
| Cell 1  | Cell 2 | Cell 3 |
| Cell 4  | Cell 5 | Cell 6 |

colspan

|\2. Header 1 | 
|Header 2 | Header 3
|-------- | --------
|\2. Cell 1   |
|Cell 2   | Cell 3

rowspan

|/2. Header 1 | Header 2 |
| Header 3 |
|-------- | --------
|/2. Cell 1   | Cell 2 |
| Cell 3 |

underline alignment

| Header 1 | Header 2 | Header 3 |
|:-------- | :--------: | ---: |
| Cell 1   | Cell 2 | Cell 3 |

cell alignment

|<. Header 1 |=. Header 2 |>. Header 3
|-------- | -------- | ---
|=. Cell 1   |>. Cell 2 |<. Cell 3

underline and cell alignment

|>. Header 1 |<. Header 2 |=. Header 3
|:-------- | :--------: | ---: |
|=. Cell 1   |>. Cell 2 |<. Cell 3

complex case

|_>/3. Header 1 | Header 2|
| Header 3 | 
| Header 4 |
| --- | --- |
|_=\2. Cell 1|
| Cell 2| Cell 3|

caption

|=. caption
|Header 1 | Header 2
|-------- | --------
|Cell 1   | Cell 2
